name: Under the red dome Demo (horror game)
name_original: Under the red dome Demo (horror game)
description:
Under the red dome is a first-person  horror game created by a solo developer.

the story

The story takes place about a young man after returning from travel

To find himself trapped among the monsters under a red dome

Average Gameplay Time: 30-35 minutes

If you have heart disease, please avoid playing this game.

If you liked the game and wanna support the development of the next projects, do

 consider donating via this site. I appreciate all the supports. 

P.S. For the best experience wearing headphones is recommended.
